price: Allah Ya ce: "Wannan ce rãnar da mãsu gaskiya, gaskiyarsu take amfãninsu. Sunã da gidãjen Aljanna, ƙõramu sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, sunã madawwama a cikinsu har abada. Allah Yã yarda da su, kuma sun yarda da Shi. wannan ne babban rabo mai girma."
arabic: قَالَ ٱللَّهُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ يَنفَعُ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ صِدۡقُهُمۡۚ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-lahu hādhā yawmu yanfaʿu al-ṣādiqīna ṣid'quhum lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadan raḍiya al-lahu ʿanhum waraḍū ʿanhu dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
